gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 120, Thunder 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pistons defeated the Thunder, 120-104. Jalen Duren led the way for the Pistons with 22 points and a career-high 21 rebounds, while Jaden Ivey added 19 points, eight rebounds and six assists in the victory. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander tallied 31 points, five rebounds and four assists for the Thunder in the losing effort, his league-leading 34th 30+ point game of the season. The Pistons improve to 6-40 on the season, while the Thunder snap a 5-game winning streak and fall to 32-14.
